# highlights

**Instance Property**

An array of shared highlights.

## Declaration

```swift
var highlights: [SWHighlight] { get }
```

## Accessing highlights

- **highlightCollectionTitle**: A localized title to display with a collection of highlights.

items.description: A localized title to display with a collection of highlights.
items.name: highlightCollectionTitle

title: highlights
